name: Willow: The Little Witch
description:
Come and survive the cruel world with Willow The abandoned little witch, in "Willow : The Little Witch"

String star fields map

Once upon a time in the witch hunt era, the little witch "Willow" woke up in the string star fields and was chased by a knight, How will Willow survive in this cruel world?

What do we have in this map?

  1. Mana potions can help you in your battle with a knight.
  2. You will be stabbed by thorns if you fall into a trap hole.
  3. The knight will immediately chase you as you approach him.
  4. You can use magic in battle as long as you have mana remaining.
  5. You can automatically regenerate 1 health & 5 mana per second as long as you are alive.

Update : Magic cliffs map

After surviving, someone sent Willow to the magic cliffs, where she met a mysterious dancing girl. She looks suspicious to me...

What do we have in this map?

  1. Sky stones can take you to your destination.
  2. If you fall from a magic cliffs, you will take a lot damage.
  3. That dancer is hiding a secret, will she grant your wish or ruin your life?
